network

Class FIFOSwitch<T extends Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Node<T>
      • network.FIFONode<T>
        • network.FIFOSwitch<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - A type of message.

    public final class FIFOSwitch<T extends Message>
extends FIFONode<T>
    Implements a switch that uses the FIFO policy.

    A switch may not receive messages (will exception if it receives a message destined for it). A switch will not perform any user-defined operations on an update.

    Author:
    Bitidork
    See Also:
    onReceiveMessage(int, Message), onUpdate(int)

      Constructors

      FIFOSwitch(FIFOScheduler<T> scheduler)
      Constructs a switch that uses FIFO policy with the supplied scheduler.
